thread.section_title: DriveTime Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of DriveTime | www.drivetime.com
thread.title: Tiffany Swanson

author: Tiffany Swanson
title: Tiffany Swanson
text: I had a wonderful car buying experience here and I'm trying to refer as many ppl as I can. I came in set on being denied. I was approved and the down payment is low and the monthly note is not bad. My insurance was pretty low. I am glad I decided to stop by. I've been catching the bus since 1998 and I just could not be more excited about this car. Thanks again guys!
